fields.summary: iOS: In Alloy, Empty LeftNavButtons tag generates unrunnable code

iOS

comments.body: Hello, I can reproduce the error in iOS. With SDK 6.0.4.GA. Empty LeftNavButtons tag shows error during run. Thanks.
